markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7+"
    pfs=""
>
[Queasy Lantern](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1293)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 38</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This bull's-eye lantern is wrapped in decrepit leather skin. It constantly emits light in a 60-foot cone (and dim light in the next 60 feet). You can close or open internal shutters with an Interact action to block or reveal the light.

<document level="2" id="action-1023" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

level="2"

>

</title>

</traits>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Standard"
>
Queasy Lantern (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 38</row>

**Price** 1,700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

The DC is 29. Creatures become sickened 2 on a failure or sickened 3 on a critical failure.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Queasy Lantern (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 38</row>

**Price** 13,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

The DC is 37. Creatures become sickened 3 on a failure or sickened 4 on a critical failure.
name: Queasy Lantern (Moderate)
